code: var menuToggle=function menuToggle(){var menu=document.getElementById('menu');var menuList=document.getElementsByClassName('menuList');if(menu.style.maxHeight==='300px'){menu.style.maxHeight='0px';}else{menu.style.maxHeight='300px';}for(var i=0;i<menuList.length;i++){menuList[i].style.display='block';}};export default menuToggle;
